text: phu sraththa thanghlay! Cng sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh theid læa khamphir thi phraxngkh di thrng prathan lng ma kæ rx sul khxng phraxngkh læa khamphir thi phraxngkh di thrng prathan lng ma kxn nan læa phu dı ptiseth sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa mla xik ah khxng phraxngkh læa brrda khamphir khxng phraxngkh læa brrda rx sul khxng phraxngkh læa wan prlok læw sir nænxn khea kdi hlng thang pi læw xyang kil
